main event: A bright light, the size of a basketball at 2,000 yards, was observed changing color from intense white to cherry red to green to blue to white. The object appeared to change size from 30 feet to 3 feet and change direction.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3 minutes by military personnel.
The object appeared to change course and fade to the rear of the aircraft.
The sighting occurred in Japan on December 29, 1960.
The object was tracked both visually and on radar.
The report includes details from multiple witnesses, including a senior pilot and the director of operations and training.
sighted object: a bright light, changing in size and color
